name: Landsat-download
tagline: Automated download of LANDSAT data from USGS website
body:
### Welcome to LANDSAT-Download pages.

This tool will help you automatically download LANDSAT data form the USGS earthexplorer web site. It was primarily included in [CESBIO Multitemp blog](http://www.cesbio.ups-tlse.fr/multitemp/), then move here for a better convenience.

There is a short user manual here :
https://github.com/olivierhagolle/LANDSAT-Download.wiki.git
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
